Uses of Package
org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving

  • Packages that use org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving 
    Package Description
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.display
    Package for objects relating to display and ui when the 3D game is running.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.game
    The main game loop for Swiss Cheese game
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving
    This package contains classes required for saving and serializing game saves to files.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows
    This package contains all classes for Swing windows of the user interface (such as menus).
  • Classes in org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving used by org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.display 
    Class and Description
    SaveMetadata
    A class for making metadata objects for GameSave class.
  • Classes in org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving used by org.swisscheese.swisscheese.game 
    Class and Description
    GameSave
    This is a class for a GameSave object that contains data of the user game that can be saved to file to save the game progress, and reopened at a later time to resume the game.
    SaveMetadata
    A class for making metadata objects for GameSave class.
  • Classes in org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving used by org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving 
    Class and Description
    GameSave
    This is a class for a GameSave object that contains data of the user game that can be saved to file to save the game progress, and reopened at a later time to resume the game.
    GameSaveList
    A wrapper class for a List of GameSave objects.
    GameSaveManager
    Class for managing serialized GameSave objects.
    SaveMetadata
    A class for making metadata objects for GameSave class.
  • Classes in org.swisscheese.swisscheese.gameSaving used by org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows 
    Class and Description
    GameSave
    This is a class for a GameSave object that contains data of the user game that can be saved to file to save the game progress, and reopened at a later time to resume the game.
